root.text: Your first day of school. Why don't you take a seat?
Pick the seat you like the most.
I think you missed your seat.
Don't you even know how to sit down?
How do you expect to make friends acting like this?
I can see, you've found a seat, but..
That seat is mine. You'll have to pick another one.
You can sit down wherever you want, but not in that one.
